sent.orig: Understanding the shelf life of a favor granted, some colleagues require immediate favor redemption.
sent.trans: 一些人明白人情也有“有效期”，因而要求人家立即奉还。

sent.orig: From his fullness we have all received, favor upon favor.
sent.trans: 从他的丰盛中，我们领受了所有，一次又一次得蒙恩宠。

sent.orig: Since then the name that I star to the football almost ask for a favor comes.
sent.trans: 从那以后我对足球明星的名字几乎张嘴就来。

sent.orig: Some who had been on the fence came out in favor of the plan.
sent.trans: 一些曾经持骑墙态度的人开始支持该计划。

sent.orig: Some are in favor of the important role of examination in the realm of education.
sent.trans: 有些人赞成考试在教育领域的重要作用。
